wikipedia_page.main: Jack Evan James (10 January 1906 – 27 October 1965) was a British fencer. He competed in the team foil event at the 1928 Summer Olympics. Great Britain lost Italy in round one, with James having lost all of his four matches.

response: * Jack James (Australian rules footballer) (1892–1977), played for St Kilda and Richmond in Victoria
